medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute, worsening mid-abdominal pain primarily in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 12 hours prior to presentation, with pain worsening over time. Accompanied by nausea and vomiting of yellow material around 11 PM the previous night. Also experienced increasing constipation and bloating over the past day. Symptoms not relieved by any reported factors.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died at age ___ of colon and pancreas cancer.
